name: Save the girl
description:
We've been looking at you like a superhero for a long time.

Welcome in this casual-adventure game of Save the Girl. Now is the time to really show off your skills. Everything is much simpler than it seems. Your mission, obvious using your logic, you will have to take care of a girl throughout her trip.

In any danger you will have to choose between bad and less bad, just so as not to allow something to happen with the main character. Take in mind that there is a way out of any situation. Nothing is impossible!

Game Features:
- 10 levels
- Each mission has 2 final choices
- Unique
